Name: Two Escapes
About the game: Two Escapes is a single player game that controls two characters simultaneously to find exits and place both of them at once. You need to move both hands independently to achieve your goal. Key Features Unique gameplay 55+ Challenging levels Gamepad supported (Windows version only) Simple pixel art graphics
